name: 02 Beltram Lupov | The Last Question (Collector's Edition)
description:
Bertram Lupov and Alexander Adell were two of the faithful attendants of Multivac. As well as any human beings could, they knew what lay behind the cold, clicking, flashing face -- miles and miles of face -- of that giant computer. They fed it data, adjusted questions to its needs and translated the answers that were issued. They were the first to ask... The Last Question.
Commemorating the 65th anniversary!

1920*1920 | MP4 | 24fps
